column4: can someone help me with the ubuntu netbook remix 9.04? How can I disable the launcher OR can i? I want it to look like the regular verison
: you can disable it from startup
: system - settings - and now I don't know the exact name (it changed, startup or sessions or something)
how do i close it after doing that? or do i just have to restart?
: login out and in should do the trick
I did that and it isn't there anymore but now my desktop panel is black and there is no start menu or anything
: I'll search for a tutorial one moment
: http://wiki.geteasypeasy.com/How_to_use_Regular_Desktop_mode_instead_of_the_Netbook_Interface_mode but it's not for the new ubuntu, but I thought it worked...
: nah, don't thank, thats just what I guided you to do and it did not worl
: maby restarting or ALT+F1 really helps
I can't get any shortcuts to appear on the desktop... do you know what setting would probably fix this for me?
right click on background doesn't provide a menu either :(
no, sry but shouldnt be to hard...
looks like the command to runthe desktop is missing
but I can't help you any further, sry
